quote: Any young man, who makes dowry a condition to marriage, discredits his education and his country and dishonours womanhood.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The demand for dowry is a cancer in society.
author: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar

quote: He who takes dowry in marriage sells his own soul.
author: Islamic Saying
Dowry Prohibition Act, 1961 (Spirit of the law)
